item.title: Unweaving Happiness
item.description: Introduction A word of warning if you are reading from a mobile Setup Data Munging Missing Adding Continents Exploration Happiness levels Standard Deviation of happiness Correlation Analysis GDPâ€™s relationship Healthy Life Expectancy Social Support Prediction Setup Modeling Model Selection Testing our model/Diagnostics Best and Worst Predictions Conclusion Introduction The World Happiness Report 2018 by United Nations Sustainable Development Solutions Network (SDSN) based on data from the Gallup World Poll surveys was out a few days ago.
